content: bow maxi skirt yarn red heart super saver brushed soft yarn in misty blue lion brand ombre scarfie lite in sepia size chart used in this pattern waist size in inches xs 24-26 waist / 34-36 hips s 27-29 waist / 37-39 hips m 29-32 waist / 39-41 hips l 33-37 waist / 41-44 hips xl 38-41 waist / 44-48 hips 2xl 42-46 waist / 49-52 hips 3xl 47-52 waist / 53-57 hips stretch waistband chain 16 row 1 double_crochet into the third stitch from the hook double_crochet in the remaining stitches you should end up with 14 double crochets chain 3 turn your work row 2-x double_crochet into the back loops only of the first stitch double_crochet into the back loops of every remaining stitch and don t double_crochet into the chain 3 from the previous row continue until the band fits just below your waist unstretched and it should come close to fitting the widest part of your hips stretched you should have 14 double crochets in every row here is a suggestion to start with of how many row you should make *keep in mind where you want the skirt to lay - low mid or high rise - and if you want the skirt to fit lower on your hip use your measurement there rather than your true waist to find your size xs 39-41 s 40-42 m 43-46 l 47-51 xl 52-55 2xl 56-60 3xl 61-66 assembly sew the ends of the waistband to make it in a tube skirt body chain an even number for the length of your skirt i chained 128 as a size xs and 5 9 this number should depend on your size as well as your height a larger size indicates you should chain more length even if you are short an average size medium who is 5 4 or a size xl who is 5 0 may also chain 128 row 1 skip the stitch on your hook and single_crochet into the second stitch from the hook chain one skip a stitch and single_crochet into the next stitch repeat this stitch for the entire row you should end the row with a single_crochet you should have 127 stitches chain 1 and then your work row 2-x single_crochet into the very first stitch chain one skip a stitch and single_crochet into the single_crochet space from the previous row chain 1 and repeat until the end of the row repeat for the remaining row until the work can fit around the widest part of your hips when stretched here is an idea according to the size chart for your hips xs 85-90 s 91-97 m 98-102 l 103-110 xl 111-120 2xl 121-130 3xl 131-143 assemble flare round 1 at the bottom of the skirt i am optionally adding a flare make a slip knot on your hook and at the back of the skirt on the bottom row insert your hook and begin to double_crochet in every stitch and increase
